sub_title: Diplomat in Training | Human Rights at Dutch MFA ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±
summary:
Egyptian-Dutch diplomat in training. Arabist and Advanced Diplomatic Studies graduate (MA and Adv. MSc.) I am a polyglot, a proactive and quick learner and excel at building intercultural relations. 

Over the past years I have aimed to integrate my academic- and personal interests and knowledge through work in (inter)national politics, various NGOs, lobbying, academic research, popular writing and participation in international conferences.

Fascinated by Human Rights, Public-/Cultural Diplomacy, International Negotiations, Conflict Resolution, Conflict Mediation, Multilateralism, Nuclear Disarmament Politics, Climate Diplomacy, Cultural Studies and Art History. Avid CrossFitter on the side.
